wiki.content: The theme to Rain Dogs seems to be beautiful discordance. "Tango Till They're Sore" has a skillfull sloppiness in the beginning, but it all works. Waits's relationship with the beat is as loose as ever. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: The theme to  Rain Dogs  seems to be beautiful discordance. "Tango Till They're Sore" has a skillfull sloppiness in the beginning, but it all works. Waits's relationship with the beat is as loose as ever.

track.name: Tango Till They're Sore
comments: let me fall out of the window with confetti in my hairrr
This guy is very interesting... I dig it
Tom Waits is my imaginary drinking-buddy. [10] !
I tell you all my secrets but I lie about my past/ Send me off to bed forever more.
put my clarinet beneath your bed til i get back in town

Well ya play that Tarantella
All the hounds they start to roar
And the boys all go to hell
Then the Cubans hit the floor
And they drive along the pipeline
They tango till they're sore
They take apart their nightmares
And they leave them by the door.
Chorus:
Let me fall out the window
With confetti in my hair
Deal out jacks or better
On a blanket by the stairs
I'll tell you all my secrets
But I lie about my past
So send me off to bed forever more.
Make sure they play my theme song
I guess daisies will have to do
Just get me to New Orleans
And paint shadows on the pews
Turn the spit on that pig
Kick the drum and let me down
Put my clarinet beneath your bed
Till I get back in town.
Chorus
Just sure she's all in calico
And the color of a doll
Wave the flag on cadillac day
And a skillet on the wall
Cut me a switch or hold you breath
Till the sun goes down
Write my name on the hood
Send me off to another town.
Chorus
I tell you all my secrets but I lie about my past...I LOVE ITTTTT
Let me fall out of the window with confetti in my hair, deal out jacks or better on a blanket by the stairs...
Tom Waits is my imaginary drinking-buddy. [9] !
Hey girls, you love this song, you love "tell ya all my secrets, but lie about my past" .. ok.. and in reality? even sexy?
